column1: prompt
Create a search query for finding articles about artificial intelligence.
Tell me if the following statement is true or false. Two bars of a piano have the same frequency.
Write a blog post about improving mental health.
Tell me the complete subject of the following sentence. I gave them the information they needed.
Create a list of instructions for setting up an email account.
Write a few sentences to describe a scene. Night, empty street.
Create a task for a GPT model.
Generate a fictional story with the following phrase. "Tomorrow will be different"
Describe the benefits of attending a virtual conference.
Create a checklist of 6 steps that someone can take to relieve stress
Suggest a layout for a website that facilitates quick navigation.
What is an ecommerce website?
Describe the trend of mobile phone usage in the past 10 years
Take the given text, identify a common phrase, and modify the text to make it more sentimentally positive. The challenge ahead of us is daunting.
Given some words, group the words into categories. apple, banana, orange, watermelon
Given some sentences, combine them into a single sentence using appropriate language. It is an excellent idea. We should definitely try it.

Provide input to the following instruction and generate a response using GPT-3. Instruction: Write a story about someone who is uncomfortable in crowded places.
Input:
A young man named David was always anxious when it came to being in crowded places.
Given some adjectives, combine them into a phrase describing a person's mood. hopeless, resentful
Create a css stylesheet to increase font size to 20px, give all text italicized font-style and apply 70% transparency to all elements.
Model a complex sentence, with "although" and a noun clause.
Detect the sentiment of the sentence. I love cleaning my room.
List 3 common techniques used for text summarization.
Explain the concept of mean, median, and mode.
Generate creative ways to learn a language.
Generate a real world example to explain the concept of supply and demand.
Given the following sentence, suggest two alternate words for the word 'hello'. Hello
Create a valid and secure password that follows password common rules.
Tell me how to make an origami swan.
Classify the following movie as romance, thriller, action, or comedy. Avengers: Endgame
Explain to me why this premise does not make sense. The chef in the kitchen at the restaurant can fly.
What does the expression 'prime the pump' mean?
Tell me how to solve the following math equation. 2x + 3y = 15
Using the PDF below, edit the text to make it more effective. https://www.example.com/example.pdf

From the given text, compose a short poem. We ventured through the garden, and saw
Many wildflowers in bloom
Come up with a way to express the following statement in a more persuasive way. This product is the most efficient.
Describe the given incident in a crisp and vivid way A woman was walking down the street when suddenly a car hit her.
Summarize in 2-3 sentences about the main character of the novel "Romeo and Juliet".
Compare the differences between a laptop and a desktop computer.
Select a sentence from the paragraph and explain its usage. He rushed to the store, which was closing in ten minutes.
Identify and explain the difference between a declarative sentence and a question.
Find five top-rated restaurants in New York City.
Describe a situation where you had to demonstrate teamwork.
Using your knowledge of geometry, tell me the angle measures of an equilateral triangle.
Construct a three-dimensional model of a prism using a square base.

Compute the size of the object given the following measurements. Length: 4.5 inches
Width: 3.2 inches
Height: 2.6 inches
Convert the text to piglatin. I will go to the store.
Output all the words in the sentence with length of 4 or more. The language is easy to learn.
Identify which type of sentence this is: declarative, interrogative, imperative, or exclamatory. Are you going to the store?
Construct the sentences using words in the given order. Most / important / the / is / thing
Describe a roller coaster in three sentences.
What is the primary benefit of using a virtual assistant to manage a business?
Imagine you are designing a game. What is the best way to motivate players?
Is the following statement true or false: Artificial intelligence is able to take over all human jobs.
What is a good example of a real-time application?
Construct a Big-O notation to explain the complexity of a certain algorithm
Determine whether the given sentence is a valid statement or not. You should respond with "True" or "False". Chocolate tastes bad.
Categorize the type of message in the given text. Thanks for all your help!
Generate a tweet summarizing the movie review article. The review article is about the movie "Toy Story"

Answer the given multiple choice question. The name of the first moon discovered orbiting Mars was:
a) Phobos 
b) Deimos 
c) Saturn

Write a closing statement for this conversation. Alice: I think we need to go over the details of the contract one more time.
Bob: Yes, I agree.
Generate a recipe that's easy to make and good for health.

Edit the paragraph to make it concise and clear in meaning. Learning a new language can be a challenging task. It can be difficult to learn a new language and master it, but if you are persistent and you put in the necessary effort, it can be achieved.
Give me three pieces of advice on how to give an effective presentation

Given a set of text in bulleted form, generate a story from them. * John was always a motivated person
* John had a dream of working for Google
* He dedicated his time and resources to learn the necessary skills
* He created a portfolio to showcase his work
* Finally, he was invited for the interview
* He was offered a developer role

Write a script for a play about two friends. Friends: Kate & Mia
Location: Mia's apartment

Come up with a story about the characters with the following description. Characters: John & Anna
Setting: A cafe
Complete the following story by providing two lines of dialogue. John had just bought a new car and was taking it out for a spin.

Create a conversation between two friends, one of them has to be indifferent towards the other person's opinion. Friends: John and Mia
Location: Mia's house
Give five tips that would help someone to become a better listener
Explain why it is important to ensure that your voice commands are understood by your personal assistant (e.g. Siri, Alexa, Google Assistant).

Given a code snippet, identify the programming language and suggest the best practice when writing the code. while (x != y):
  
  x = x + 1
Go through the text and edit the typos. Arthurrrr, who was residin in New York had a plan.
What is the meaning of the phrase "it takes one to know one"?
Explain why is SEO important for improving ranking on search results page?
Given a sequence of numbers, find the sum and average of all numbers in the sequence. 2, 3, 5, 8

Given a riddle, identify the hidden message My voice is tender, my waist is slender
And I’m often invited to play.

My foot’s not stumpy, I don’t play a trumpet
But still attract much attention each day.
